Many like to claim that a ninja hired by Oda Nobunaga crawled up kenshins t=
oilet (with a spear), stuck it up his rear, and then returned to collect hi=
s pay.=A0 This is a load of...... well, you know.=A0 He had stomach cancer =
from drinking alot of sake his whole life, and this is what killed him.=A0 =
Many would disagree, but it seems to me that it would be very convenient fo=
r a shinobi to claim such a feat to collect his pay.=A0 I would be happy to=
 hear any other input on this though....
